body:
Hi everyone, iBiZa_MiNeCrAfT here.

Everyone's doing an AMA, so here I am with one.

Ask away!

P.S I will reply to all tomorrow evening.

title: AMA (New Name)

replies.body: Why did you choose FaZe_ as new name? :o
replies.body_tagged: Why did you choose FaZe_ as new name? :o

replies.body: Pretty impressive that it wasn't taken :P Favorite football (soccer) team?
replies.body_tagged: Pretty impressive that it wasn't taken :P Favorite football (soccer) team?

replies.body:
Because I watch FaZe clan alot, and I thought it looked cool
P.S Ambivalence_, FaZe was taken c:
